detailed_description: Demonstrated high‑reflectivity heliostat array in Arizona
Secured first European pilot CSP project
Introduced thermal battery enabling nighttime power
Joint development agreement signed for MENA CSP
Reported water scarcity delaying cooling at CSP plant
Implemented dry‑cooling redesign to resolve issue

Recorded highest ever EPC contract bookings
